title: Forum Level?
body: I've tried looking up my issue but I wasn't able to find anything, so I apologize if the information is out there and I didn't see it. I'm well over level 30 in-game, but on the forums I'm shown as level 5. I was curious if there was a separate leveling system specifically for the forums? Any help would be appreciated, this is the only forum I can actually post on lol

replies.body: Your Boards level is linked to your client Summoner level, but sometimes they get out of whack. Posting here in H&S or using the Syncing Tool up top will get them synced back up.
